body: If you're only running daylighting analysis MSH2RAD is the best solution otherwise I would do what Chris has suggested. [Here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/add-shading-context-honeybee?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1366942&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987) is a related discussion. [](http://api.ning.com/files/3FLLVGZOVWLFNUDrIJ1d8JxRdQiEzZQ8M20-N0MjiYhQZFfF4BtM5iNm5H2uNCIQTPj59RHZfhpu6rvx9ITRGkQKiuyI*bpA/MR.png)
